group.title: Dynamic Widgets
group.description:
Dynamic Widgets are a series of widgets that can be created and modified using blocks. The process is simple, each widget can be created with method blocks, with unique ids. The properties of each widget are set or edited with property blocks.

Each extension (depending on the type of widget it provides) allows you to create unlimited widgets, with scopes. Which means that widgets with the same id can optionally exist, but in different containers.
